## TinySynq.synqTables property

Object containing [SyncableTable](./tinysynq-web.syncabletable.md)<!-- -->s, keyed by table name.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get synqTables(): Record<string, SyncableTable> | undefined;
```

## Remarks

A [SyncableTable](./tinysynq-web.syncabletable.md) structure is never modified. TinySynq maintains its own tables and triggers for tracking and responding to changes.
